start.text: Please type `PRFSTART_CMD` to tell me a fairytale.

story.title: Please tell me the title of your story.
story.submitted: Thank you for submitting your story. Our team are looking over it now.
story.accepted: Hey! Your story has been accepted!
story.denied: Sorry, but your story has been declined.

embed.title: Title
embed.publicTitle: Heyho friends, here is a new story by AUTHOR called 'TITLE'

tryAgainLater: Sorry, but I couldn't find the channel to send the story to. Please try again later.
publicNotFound: Sorry but I couldn't find the public story channel.
